example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # Get the value of the PI constant.%0A    val PI = field Math::PI;%0A%0A    # Create some angles in radians. %0A    # angle1 = 60 degrees%0A    # angle2 = 30 degrees%0A    # angle3 = 20 degrees%0A    val angle1 = PI / 3.0;%0A    val angle2 = PI / 6.0;%0A    val angle3 = PI / 9.0;%0A%0A    # Print the angles.%0A    F::println(%22Angle #1 = %22 .. angle1);%0A    F::println(%22Angle #2 = %22 .. angle2);%0A    F::println(%22Angle #3 = %22 .. angle3);%0A    F::println();%0A%0A    # Compue some common tangents.%0A    val a = F::tan(angle1);%0A    val b = F::tan(angle2);%0A    val c = F::tan(angle3);%0A%0A    # Print the results. %0A    F::println(%22tan(PI / 3) = %22 .. a);%0A    F::println(%22tan(PI / 6) = %22 .. b);%0A    F::println(%22tan(PI / 9) = %22 .. c);%0A    F::println();%0A%0A    # Compute the related arctangents.%0A    val x = F::atan(a);%0A    val y = F::atan(b);%0A    val z = F::atan(c);%0A%0A    # Print the results. %0A    F::println(%22atan(PI / 3) = %22 .. x);%0A    F::println(%22atan(PI / 6) = %22 .. y);%0A    F::println(%22atan(PI / 9) = %22 .. z);%0A    F::println();%0A}
